name: Boo's A Crowd
description:
Boo's a Crowd is a couch co-op RPG where you follow two ghosts as they try to escape an ancient ruin. The ruin is dangerous, even for ghosts, but with the power of possession up their figurative sleeves, and one physical body to share between them, they just might be able to make this work. 

This project was created for the UC Berkeley Game Design and Development Decal in Fall 2021. 

Game Designer/Programmer: Kayla Kranen

Artist: Miranda Zhang

Sound Designer/Programmer: Aidan Meyer

Lead Programmer: Matthew Lu

Mentor: Noor Mahini
